about_the_game:
Ascend!

150 Floors is a roguelite, tile-based strategy RPG where you can choose to play as 8 different elemental mages. Battle your way through 150 floors filled with many eccentric enemies and meet different characters who may or may not help you on your journey, as you reach and defeat the top floor!



Gameplay

Your adventure takes place in a tower that has 150 floors filled with enemies. Use different magical skills unique to each mage to attack your enemies and defend yourself. Each floor made up of tiles have a durability limit. If you attack an enemy, you're also attacking the tile they occupy as well and it may break, sending the enemy to the previous floor. This same logic applies to your opponents as well. If the tile you occupy breaks, you fall to the previous floor as well. Defeat all monsters on a floor and an elevator appears on the floor, taking you to the next floor.



Story

2 years prior in a distant land, strange creatures spawned from the top of a large tower and began their invasion, killing millions of people and consuming their souls. Each mage, afflicted by the sudden invasion of strange creatures, wants to rid the land of these creatures for their own personal reasons. The only similarities they share are to reach the 150th floor and conquer it, granting them any wish they desire... Or so the saying goes.



Features
- Choose between 8 mages with their own unique elements!
- Battle over 70+ different enemies, each with their own magic skills!
- Use over 100 different magic skills!
- Decide between a Pure, Natural and Tainted alignment, as you evolve your mage to use stronger magic!

name: 150 Floors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
